C06LFP11W9Y.content: What is the highest mountain and how high is it?
The highest mountain in the world is Mount Everest, which is located in the Himalayas. It has an elevation of approximately 8,848 meters or 29,029 feet above sea level.

C06LUCXR1S5.content: I am talking about the deepest spot in the ocean. Where is it by the way...?

Ah, you're referring to the Mariana Trench! Located in the western Pacific Ocean, it's the deepest part of the world's oceans, reaching a maximum known depth of approximately 36,070 feet (over 10,994 meters) at a point known as the Challenger Deep. That's quite a fascinating place, teeming with unique creatures and geological wonders!
